title: Ben Brintz
text:
Ben J. Brintz
ben.brintz@hsc.utah.edu
EDUCATION
PhD in Statistics, Oregon State, Corvallis, OR, March 2018
- Dissertation: A Normal Approximation to N-Mixture Models with Applications in Large Abundance Estimation and Disease Surveillance
MS in Statistics, Oregon State, Corvallis, OR, June 2014
- Conducted Unit/Sub-unit sample size study on second growth forest tree harvest effect on the Oregon Slender Salamander
- Used simulation and Just Another Gibbs Sampler in R to implement multilevel logistic regression model for estimation and precision analysis across various settings
BA in Mathematics/Statistics, Grinnell College, Grinnell, IA, May 2010
